name: SKAdTestPostback
desc: A test postback that contains ad conversion information in the testing environment.

items.name: init?(version: SKAdTestPostbackVersion, adNetworkIdentifier: String, adCampaignIdentifier: Int, appStoreItemIdentifier: Int, sourceAppStoreItemIdentifier: Int, conversionValue: Int, fidelityType: Int, isRedownload: Bool, didWin: Bool, postbackURL: String)
items.desc: Creates a test postback with the provided postback parameters.

items.name: var postbackURL: String
items.desc: A URL on your server where the testing environment sends test postbacks.

items.name: var version: NSString
items.desc: The SKAdNetwork version that the postback uses.

items.name: var isRegistered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the postback is registered in the testing environment.

items.name: var adNetworkIdentifier: String
items.desc: A string that represents the advertising network’s unique identifier.

items.name: var transactionIdentifier: String
items.desc: A unique transaction identifier that the system generates.

items.name: var adCampaignIdentifier: Int
items.desc: A number that represents the advertising network’s campaign.

items.name: var appStoreItemIdentifier: Int
items.desc: The item identifier of the app that this ad impression advertises.

items.name: var sourceAppStoreItemIdentifier: Int
items.desc: The item identifier of the app that displays the ad.

items.name: var isRedownload: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user redownloaded and reinstalled the app.

items.name: var fidelityType: Int
items.desc: An integer that indicates the type of ad impression, StoreKit-rendered or view-through.

items.name: var conversionValue: Int
items.desc: An unsigned 6-bit value that the app or ad network control.

items.name: var didWin: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the postback won the attribution.
